description: Near Cullen numbers: n such that (n+1)*2^n+1 is prime.
comments: Primes of the form n+1 are 2, 3, 7, 67, ... - _Juri-Stephan Gerasimov_, Oct 02 2011Primes in the sequence are 2, 5, 13, 1823, 96749, .. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 15 2011
author: _Henri Lifchitz_
extensions: Corrected and extended by Herman Jamke (hermanjamke(AT)fastmail.fm), Jan 05 2008
